Package geometries

Class RadialGeometry

java.lang.Object
geometries.Intersectable
geometries.Geometry
geometries.RadialGeometry
Direct Known Subclasses:
Sphere, Tube
public abstract class RadialGeometry extends Geometry
The abstract class RadialGeometry implements the determination of a rounded shape radius and more things down the road.
